
# Oscy.js

Just another instrument by Oscillator on Web Audio API


## Usage

	<div id="oscy"></div>

	<script src="vendor/jquery.js"></script>
	<script src="vendor/jquery-easing.js"></script>
	<script src="vendor/oscy.js"></script>

	<script>

	new oscy.Composer("#oscy", {
		/* options */
	});

	</script>
